text: The 2011 Southern District Council election was held on 6 November 2011 to elect all 17 elected members to the 20-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:23.53%;" | 4 | style="background:red; width:76.47%;" | 13 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:35.29%;" | 6 | style="background:red; width:64.71%;" | 11 |- | Pro-democracy | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== Category:2011 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2011 Southern District Council election
